Bhā，（f．） [cp．Vedic bhā & bhāḥ nt．] light，splendour; given as name of a jewel at an extremely doubtful passage J．V，317，318，where T．reads “vara taṁ bhaññam icchasi，＂ & C．expl<sup>s</sup>．：“bhā ti ratanass’etaṁ nāmaṁ．＂ The v．l．for bhaññaṁ is bhuñjaṁ; the passage may be corrupt from “varatu bhavaṁ yam icchasi．＂ （Page 501）
BHĀ：[f] ánh sáng，sự chói lọi，rực rỡ
